original_title: Private university students get more jobs than State university students: Susil
original_body_lines: Education Minister Susil Premajayantha said private university students have access to more job opportunities whereas State university students waste their time engaging in protests and ending up being unemployed.
He also said out of 160,000 A/L qualified students only 40,000 students can be given placements at State universities.
"The remaining students must also have a university education. If they pay money for that education, what is the problem?" he questioned.
